title: N9ve
text:
N9ve is the eighth album by Brazilian singer, songwriter, arranger, <a href="record%20producer">producer</a> <a href="Ana%20Carolina">Ana Carolina</a>. Launched in 2009, the album received a certified Gold record in Brazil by ABPD due by more than 50 000 copies sold in the country.
Promotion and world tour.
The tour starts on September 9, 2009 – the day the singer full 35 years – at Citibank Hall, Rio de Janeiro. On August 22, 2009 Ana sang the album's first single, glances at the "<a href="UNICEF">Criança Espernaça</a>". A note on the official site of the singer announced that the start date of the tour will no longer be September 9 and, later, the fan club Donana Carolina released through the site, Twitter and his blog the event dates.
The tour of "N9ve" began on November 14, in <a href="S%C3%A3o%20Paulo">São Paulo</a> and so far she has gone through several cities in Brazil and Europe such as <a href="Barcelona">Barcelona</a>, Paris, <a href="Madrid">Madrid</a>, Rome and <a href="Zurich">Zurich</a>.
